events.message: We have received the application from the candidate who is interested in the software engineer position we advertised recently.
The candidate's application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering department for software development roles.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process.
The candidate successfully passed the initial screening call, demonstrating strong background in software development and problem solving.
The candidate responded promptly and positively confirmed availability for the upcoming technical interview.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the candidate to assess coding skills and experience in software engineering.
The technical interview was completed successfully, with the candidate demonstrating excellent knowledge of development frameworks and coding best practices.
Following a strong technical interview, the HR interview has been scheduled to discuss candidate fit within company culture.
The HR interview went well, and the candidate expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity to join the engineering team.
An official job offer has been proposed to the candidate with competitive salary and benefits aligned with the software engineer role.
The candidate has provided positive feedback on the offer and is excited about the prospect of joining the company.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer and confirmed start date to begin their role as a software engineer.
The onboarding process has started smoothly with the new engineer completing initial setup and team introductions.
The recruitment process for the software engineer position has been successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated.
